metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20362 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in ifilter_bank oflibfaad/filtbank.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. Thevulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash becauseadding to windowed output is mishandled in the EIGHT_SHORT_SEQUENCE case.

criterions.comment: faad2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
